environment.vehicle ModuleÔÉÅ

class environment.vehicle.Vehicle(vehicle_id, types, out_dict, index_dict, edge_position, sumo)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Vehicle class representing a vehicle in the simulation.

vehicle_idÔÉÅ

Unique identifier for the vehicle.

Type:

str

direction_choicesÔÉÅ

List of possible direction choices.

Type:

list

out_dictÔÉÅ

Dictionary of outgoing edges.

Type:

dict

index_dictÔÉÅ

Dictionary of edge indices.

Type:

dict

sumoÔÉÅ

SUMO simulation instance.

edge_positionÔÉÅ

Dictionary of edge positions.

Type:

dict

__init__(vehicle_id, types, out_dict, index_dict, edge_position, sumo) → NoneÔÉÅ

Initialize a Vehicle instance with the given parameters.

Parameters:

  • vehicle_id (str) ‚Äì Unique identifier for the vehicle.

  • types (int) ‚Äì Number of vehicle types.

  • out_dict (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of outgoing edges.

  • index_dict (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of edge indices.

  • edge_position (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of edge positions.

  • sumo ‚Äì SUMO simulation instance.

Dispatch the vehicle to pick up a passenger.

random_relocate()ÔÉÅ

Relocate the vehicle to a random lane.

set_destination(action, destination_edge)ÔÉÅ

Set the destination edge for the vehicle.

Parameters:

  • action (str) ‚Äì Chosen action.

  • destination_edge (str) ‚Äì Destination edge ID.

Returns:

str
